posts.title: Grandma's Drachentrout Quiche
posts.body: Made using fresh drachentrout catched by our own chef, Vane. Please enjoy it.

posts.title: Pate de Campagne
posts.body: Pate is, uhh, I'll go ask Percy - Vane.

posts.title: White Dragon Pennyfowl Vegetable Soup
posts.body: A warm and light soup, just like the White Dragon Knight's Captain.

posts.title: Black Dragon Cream of Porcinido Soup
posts.body: A thick and sweet soup, just like the Black Dragon Knight's Captain.

posts.title: Demonbream Poele with Special Sauce
posts.body: Can you believe Siegfried just catched the fish with his own barehand? For the love of Bahamut. - Percival

posts.title: Chateaubrilliant Roast with Fritters
posts.body: Whoa! It's so good!! The fries are so crunchy and the meat is sweet! - Lancelot

posts.title: Kopi Leol
posts.body: Made from beans that have been eaten by Leol. Don't worry we washed it first.

posts.title: Rugosa Floral Tea
posts.body: It's a tea. With a flower or two. Very calming.

posts.title: Elemental Sorbet
posts.body: Wind, water, fire or earth? A light-dark combo? Or maybe full rainbow grid? Choose your favorite here.

posts.title: Rich and Creamy Flan : Rood
posts.body: I used those slugs and added some ingredients like milk and strawberries. Enjoy - Siegfried

posts.title: Rich and Creamy Flan : Blauw
posts.body: Still used the same ingredients, but instead of strawberries I added some blueberries. Hope you like it too - Siegfried
